title: Logistic growth of a rumor part - a

content.description: A certain rumor spreads through a community at the rate dy/dt= 2y(1âˆ’y) , where y is the proportion of the population that has heard the rumor at time t.
content.question: What proportion of the population has heard the rumor when it is spreading the fastest?
